https://www.linkedin.com/in/abubakar-sad.name: Abubakar Saddique
https://www.linkedin.com/in/abubakar-sad.about: An experienced IT Professional who has Results-oriented, resourceful and problem-solving skills in large scale software design and development for a wide variety of companies. Proven ability to successfully analyse an organization's critical business requirements, identify deficiencies and potential opportunities, and develop innovative and cost-effective mobile & web-based solutions for enhancing competitiveness, increasing revenues, and improving service offerings.Experience implementing and supporting large scale software programs:Twelve years experience implementing and providing support for mobile and web-based software solutions, software architecture and assessment of existing infrastructure while equally focusing on Ui/Ux design to deliver such products that could help our clients to facilitate in their businesses.Demonstrated experience in project management in a software/IT environment:Extensive experience in project management in software and IT environments across varied clients in the last twelve years. I have managed healthcare solutions for hospitals i.e. EMR's, e-commerce solutions to operate online stores via ERP's, School Management System, Recruitment sites i.e. TechCrunch Job board, Personforce Job Portal, and CVMATCH, Home Automation -  Internet of Things (IoT) -  and programming for distributed systems.Excellent documentation and communication skills:During my services, I was engaged to document software processes, workflows, procedures and research to the finest detail. I have exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to negotiate effectively with both internal and external stakeholders at all levels.

experience.Description: - Help Techverx accelerate growth and consumption through Domain Driven Development(DDD), solution-designed business and technical capabilities- Trusted Advisor to Enterprise and SMB customers- Expertise in providing architectural solutions in suggesting architectural improvements, design solutions and integration solutions based on the applications migrated to AWS Cloud- Provide Presale support in designing the migration plan, preparing BOM and presenting the solutions to customer- Working with customers to create Proof of concepts (POCs) and guiding customers through to production deployment and operationalisation of projects- Conduct customer workshop to enable them on AWS- Be an AWS Platform evangelist with customers, partners and external communities.

Project Brief (CVMATCH): A web application where candidates can register and create a CV using an AI-based chatbot system. Once the candidate CV is created then the system engages AI-based algorithms to parse the CV and rank it against the industrial skills. The product includes several AWS services involved to analyse the CV parsed data. The product also uses Optical character recognition (OCR) techniques to extract the data from PDF format CVs and rank the CV against the registered skills. The user was able to analyze markets where there was high demand and low competition. It also included an admin panel to manage by the site admin for administrative actions. Responsibilities:Project management - work to project timelines and deadlines, also ensuring all team members are working to project timelines and deadlinesworking with Data Science, Artificial intelligence, Machine learning, Big data.Ability to integrate, update, manage third party API’sManage and improve web/product/system architectureAssist with the recruitment process for hiring junior developers.Develops software solutions by studying information needs; conferring with users; studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; investigating problem areas; following the software development lifecycle.

At Pearlgates software solutions I am performing my significant role while engaged company clients to uncover and assess issues and needs while delivering effective connectivity using IOT solutions. I assist PGSS to realise the bigger picture of the fourth industrial 4.0 wave in order to solve real-world problems, for that documentation is the key to interpreting clients’ needs into the desired product.My prime responsibility is to execute project management responsibilities for assigned service initiatives to include interactions with partners, vendors and other service providers and device methods for assuring timely delivery of products. I am a Full-stack developer of MEAN (MongoDB-Express-Angular-NodeJs), React, python, AWS IOT Greengrass, FreeRTOS, DynamoDB, AWS Kinesis etc. I love programming and creating a solution for clients using my time management skills.My successful Deliverables with PGSS:=> We have created Complete "Air quality solution" installed indoor and outdoor to monitor air quality for Japan and Korea is known as Air-Is-Life=> FS4 a soccer cloud platform for Germany in order shortlist talent for under 9teen, where we have created an integrated solution for IoT score screens installed at grounds/courts.  => SMART Apartment Project in Germany - using AWS IoT green-grass services we are able to control building temperature, energy consumption, and Machine Learning techniques enable us to identify individual user interactivity patterns for an apartment.

My role is to assure the successful execution of the company’s business mission through development and deployment of the company’s web presence. This requires envisioning the company’s service offerings as a web-based business, leading implementation of web applications, and planning for risk and growth.We used complete open-source environment, to facilitate our UK, CANADA and USA clients with update business solutions. Our Company is running "Full stack, JavaScript programs" i.e. MEAN.JS, where we are working extensively on MongoDB, node. j's and Angularjs. We are focused team to embed our systems with machine learning to achieve our goals effectively and efficiently.We do have expertise developing and managing Internet of Things (IoT) projects along with embedded  ERP's like Odoo and EMR's like an OpenEMR for some of our local and International clients along with PHP, Wordpress, Codeigniter, SLIM Framework  to develop an API in PHP framework.

My primary responsibility was to convert ideas into reality. During the tenure I have polished my skills in open source environment, to facilitate employer UK and USA clients. @Personforce we had one of the best diversify and supportive team, that enabled me to lead the IT market nationally and internationally. i.e. I was engaged to communication with client beginning from requirement gathering to the completion of the solutions. I deliver software solutions, test & debug major features of the applications. such as Personforce Job portal, Telehealth project, Job board and Job portals etc. I have delivered software applications and solutions within the set schedule with high degree of quality. I was also responsible to Identify potential enhancements, design, develop and implement software applications and solutions in conjunction with the Product Development Manager or designate. I have successfully manage and mentor group of fellow developers under my supervision. a) Developed market up to date and innovative Application. TechCrunch Job board. b) Contributed to world wide web with semantic web. ERP such as Odoo c) Develop Web Development trending skills i.e micro-services REST API's,

We mainly worked in PHP 5 development along AJAX, JavaScripting, jQuery under the update Frameworks including ZEND, eclips etc. We worked with the Government for their "Management Information Systems". My Jobs was to deploy the codes and organize the Module with a diversified engineering team. I coordinated with the Quality Assurance department to deliver bug free products. Reported to the Management as per needed, i.e. majorly I was involved with the Proposal writing, project delivery and project deployment status reports etc.

I mainly worked in the researches on “Women role in dairy sector”, “Gender equality in the dairy business”, and “Rural women entrepreneurship development through group strengthen model”. I did my part in establishment of VMC (Village Milk Collection Centers), development of modules for training of farmers / VMCs. Studied the impact of overall activities on social structure, poverty reduction.

activity.text: Love this too!Many believe that perfection is to be attained to help or inspire others. It is our quest to develop, improve, grow with purpose and focus on excellence that matters. There is nothing perfect about being human, the earlier we realize this fact, the easier it is for us to accept our flaws and work on our continuous improvement.The ability to help and support others comes from the interest and willingness and not from perfection.As someone wisely said,“There’s no need to be perfect to inspire others. Let people get inspired by how you deal with your imperfections.” #inspiration #motivation #leadership #personaldevelopment #leadershipdevelopment #successmindset

activity.act_desc: Professor, Qatar University (QU) and Information Technology University (ITU)
activity.text: Bismillah Ar-Rahman Ar-Raheem.I am happy to share that I have joined Qatar University (QU) in Doha as a Professor of Computer Engineering in the Computer Science and Engineering Department starting this Fall. I am happy that I also retain my affiliation with ITU, Lahore, Pakistan.I praise and thank Allah SWT for His bounties and making this transition easy for me and my family. I also express my utter neediness for His continued blessings. May Allah SWT bless this sojourn for me and my family and make it easy for me to engage in service and scholarship with excellence.رب أنزلني منزلا مباركا وأنت خير المنزلينLooking forward to meeting and catching up with old and new friends, students, colleagues, and collaborators.

activity.act_desc: Software Engineer at Emumba | Python Developer | Django | Flask | Golang Developer
activity.text: My father never ever attended any school. He was a farmer by profession. In his 60s When he was not able to continue with farming.  He started working as shop keeper, a small cabin on the main street of the village, and on/off worked as a daily wager with local farmers. After 10 years  When I (his only son) was 14, I started to insist in front of him to not work and let me take responsibility of the home.  I was not able to see him working in such hard conditions with a full white beard. He then told me "Look son, I am working in my 70s so that you do not have an excuse to quit education." These words of him still echos in my ear and I am not able to rest a full night. Whenever I waste an hour it reminds me of his efforts and works for my success. He worked when others were planning retirement. He worked in June & July, under the skin burning sun, cold nights, and rains. He wanted to see his son, the first family member, to be graduated. It was 3 years before in 2018 when I graduated from FAST NUCES. He was so happy to see me wearing a cap and gown. And I was happy to see him smiling. It was the first time in a decade when we were so much happy as the whole world had been conquered. They say there is women behind every successful man, it may be true in their case but I am heard rephrasing it  "There is a man behind my success.". And I am missing him badly today.PS:My mother was a strong mother. She also struggled a lot, a long side my father in this journey. They both paired up in a battle where they wanted to succeed their only son, to lead future generation. They both belonged to the same socioeconomic class. They both struggled and came out as winner from this battle of gold and silver. Her struggles are also bitter and painful. I may write about her struggles in another post some other day. Bear with me till then ...My Facebook profile: https://lnkd.in/gZmD8vDQ#MissYouMom #MissYouKaka #MissYouFather #lifestories #devcommunity #fatherhood #Father #Inspiring #Motivational
